name: International Conference on Education and Social Sciences
content: The 5th International Conference on Education and Social Sciences (ICEASS) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of the fields of Communication, Society, Education, Culture, Politics, Law, Business, Finance, Economics, Management, Psychology and more. 2018 ICEASS will take place from February 22-24 in Bangkok, Thailand. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. For more information, please visit: http://iceass.org or contact: iceass@iceass.org
